question:
You want to sell your television. You think a friend of yours might like to buy it from you. Write a letter to your friend.

In your letter:

Explain why you are selling the television
Describe the television
Suggest a date when your friend can come and see it
text: How are you buddy? The last time we spoke, you told me that you were planning to buy a television. I am writing to tell you I am planning to sell mine.

As you know, I had applied for a course at the University of London. Fortunately, I got accepted for it and I will be flying on the 23rd of next month. Hence, before I go, I am planning to sell off a few things which include this television as there won't be anyone to use it after I leave.

Since, it was bought only a month ago, it is in a perfect working condition and has warranty valid for another ten months. Being a smart TV, with the help of wireless internet, you can get access to all social media applications. Additionally, it has screen mirroring feature as well.

I will be finishing all my paperwork for the visa application by the end of this week, post which we can catch up. Therefore, if you are free, you can come over on Sunday to see the television. We can speak at length and then you can decide if you wish to purchase it or not.
